class_notes: Study Abroad. Course meets abroad from May 31 - July 5, 2024. Apply online at www.studyabroad.emory.edu
course_description: One of two courses of the South Pacific Summer Study Abroad Program introducing participating students doing supervised developmental research in Samoa and Vanuatu during home stays
